name: bsky-cron
description: A cron job that posts random numbers to Bluesky

scripts.test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && sleep 2 && DB_CONNECTION=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5433/bsky_cron_test bun test && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:setup: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && sleep 2 && DB_CONNECTION=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5433/bsky_cron_test npx prisma db push
